name: Toppy's Workshop
description:
Toppy's Workshop is a reimagining of my game Toppy's Toy Shop, which was fine but lacked a ton of stuff. This one's my second take on the idea.

Stuff you might want to know:

-No jumpscares
-Speedrun-friendly
-Lightweight
-Standard FPS controls
-Mouse Y Inversion option
-Sensitivity option
-Field of View option
